column2: See: I’m a 35-year-old father of four with $135,000 saved for retirement. Retirement can be an emotional time, usually for individuals leaving the workforce who have felt their careers defined much of who they are, but sometimes also for the retiring person’s family. Your wife may have a lot of feelings associated with your retirement, and it’s important to keep her in the loop every step of the way, as you seem to have done so far.
column4: I’ll have $5 million for retirement when I sell my dental practice next year — but my wife and kids don’t want me to retire
